revision.text: Possibly: A View of the Evidences of Christianity. In three parts. Part I. Of the direct Historical Evidence of Christianity, and wherein it is distinguished from the Evidence alledged for other Miracles. Part II. Of the auxiliary evidences of Christianity. Part III. A brief consideration of some popular objections. By William Paley, M. A. Archdeacon of Carlisle. In two volumes. (London : Printed for R. Faulder, New Bond Street, M.DCC.XCIV. [1794]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2409558~S1
